page.title: 02Kenneling Dogs in Killamarsh
page.content: We walked down to the Kennels and talked to the man who runs them. He is not the owner, but works for the woman who owns the property. He has worked there two years. The dogs are taken a walk once each day, but most kennels do not take their dogs a walk. The dogs are fed and given fresh water each day and their kennels are cleaned out every day. There is only one dog to each kennel unless they have two from the same home. The manager enjoys his job very much because he likes dogs although he always busy. The telephone is often ringing with people booking in their pets. If a pet has to have medicine, they will do that and if a pet is taken ill they will first call the vet and then ask the owner's permission for anything that needs to be done. The dogs eat a soya mix which is much better for them than meat.
